articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Case of Illegal Wire-tapping in S. Korea
Dismantlement of "UN Forces Command" Urged in S. Korea
Thursday Meeting for Punishing Murderer of Peasants Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Thursday Meeting for Punishing Murderer of Peasants Held in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A Thursday meeting for the punishment of those responsible for killing peasants was reportedly held at Thapgol Park in Seoul on Dec. 22 under the sponsorship of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy of south Korea.
 At the meeting speakers denounced policemen for having indiscriminately cracked down upon the participants in a rally of peasants on November 15, killing Jon Yong Chol and Hong Tok Phyo and wounding more than 600 others.    
 A statement issued at the meeting urged the "government" to punish the murderers at an early date and take radical measures for protecting the vital rights of the people and reviving agriculture.

Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of his assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and on the occasion of the New Year Juche 95 (2006).
 They were conveyed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today by Bashir Ramadan Khalifa Abu Janah, secretary of the People's Bureau of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestine
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestine
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the New Year Juche 95 (2006).
 It was conveyed to an official concerned today by a staff member of the Palestinian embassy here.

articles.title: Greetings to Jordanian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Jordanian Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Abdul Illah Al-Khatib on his appointment as foreign minister of Jordan.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the Jordanian foreign minister success in his work.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Equatorial Guinean President
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of Equatorial Guinea and chairman of the Democratic Party.
 It was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday by Filiberto Ntutumu Nguema, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, who is heading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK.
